name: Robodomo
headline: IoT automation framework for developers
description: Robodomo creates a universal interface for communicating with the fragmented market of IoT vendors. Using the simplicity of MQTT messages, IoT devices can interact, follow automation patterns, feed data lakes, and learn from external data. Think of it as IoT devices tweeting each other messages to influence behavior.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: iot, robodomo, home automation, iot automation, node, mqtt

content.title: Rich IoT Dashboard Example
content.description: Robodomo comes with a rich IoT dashboard that consumes MQTT manages to visalize the data from a responsive web application. Build with beautiful Ionic web components, this control panel subscribes to events in the IoT infrastructure and communicates information back using the same powerful MQTT protocol.

content.title: Ready for Machine Learning and AI
content.description: Robodomo ships with a palette of microservices that serve as translators between propriatery IoT vendor APIs and the universal MQTT protocol. Developers no longer need to worry about vendor-specific language. This also allows for exciting features like populating big data services for Machine Learning and prediction-based instructions to industrial and home IoT environments.
